messages.text: Welcome to Story Mode! Please press the button on the bottom of the screen to continue.
Hello! I'm Tony Emoji. When a speaker like me asks you a question, just click one of the emojis on the bottom of the screen to answer. Now, you try! Do you like to drink coffee or tea?
Hi! I'm you, the user. I like to drink coffee. Let's have a cup together!
Hi! I'm you, the user. I like to drink tea. Let's have a cup together!
That sounds great! I like to drink coffee, too. Let's close this conversation and have a cup together! Press the button on the bottom of the screen to continue.
That sounds great! I like to drink tea, too. Let's close this conversation and have a cup together! Press the button on the bottom of the screen to continue.
Congratulations! Now you know the basics of Story Mode. Press the button on the bottom of the screen to exit.
